name: Wayfarer
description: You grew up on the streets, surviving by your wits. You learned how to find food, shelter, and safety in the most unlikely places. You have a knack for getting by with nothing.

feature.name: Wanderer's Welcome
feature.description: You know the streets and slums of cities. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other wayfarers, including those who might give you shelter. You can find such a haven if one exists. While there, you have access to information from the local network of vagrants and outcasts.
